entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
